entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT IN EFFECT, Lansdowne House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:35 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -5.9°C

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 11 this morning then rising.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then clearing. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Temperature falling to minus 11 this morning then rising. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016
